card_02.title: Look for what you like

card_03.paragraph: Get recommendations based on your taste, habits, and loved music. Coming soon!

card_05.title: Study millions of text documents
card_05.paragraph: The Polifonia Corpus offers a professional interface to study how music terminology evolved across countries

card_06.title: Create stories with music data
